name: ChromatiCity (RamDaj, soccyx, Griffin, tonywzy, khanhdao)
description:
A puzzle exploration game in a world void of colour. It's up to you to bring colour back to a once bright and beautiful city by solving puzzles and inspiring each colour king/queen to rise up again. It's up to the player to determine which colours to save first since some colours are required to solve others.

OUR TEAM

*Lead: Ramzi Dajani
*Programmers: Ramzi Dajani, Shehzaad Daureeawoo, Tony Wang
*Models: Stephany Camba, Sara Hosseini, Khanh Dao, Latiesha Faisal
*Level Design: Ramzi Dajani, Stephany Camba
*Animation: Stephany Camba
*Character Design: Sara Hosseini
*SFX: Lifia Teguh
*Music: Grffin Hook, Lifia Teguh
